title: Pharma R Opportunities for Under-represented Developers (PROUD)
text:
NAME ALTERNATIVES:
- inclusiveR - spotlight/R

What is PROUD?
PROUD is an inclusive R community for developers who primarily work in the pharmacuetical industry.


What are PROUD’s objectives?
The goals of PROUD are to provide a welcoming, equitable and supportive space for people to upskill, share knowledge and build their network. We hope this space will particularly build inclusibity for those that are underrepresented and underrecognised in more traditional communities.


How can I get involved?

slack?
monthly meet ups / webinars

title: About
text:
Why is an inclusive R community important?
The more mainstream approaches to networking and skills sharing or development can, in some cases, lack diversity and inclusion.
These are a bit spicy?

Have you ever gone to a panel where we only hear the perspective of those from a single demongraphic of the community?
Have you read issues or discussions in the R community and felt discouraged from sharing your work by the aggressive communication style used?

Let’s work together in our safe space to build a community where we share learnings, upskill each other and facilitate network building.
